item.title: Distance Marker on OR-138 West
item.description: Distance marker on OR-138 west to Diamond Lake, Crater Lake, and Roseburg. Taken just west of Diamond Lake Junction.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-138
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) to Diamond Lake, Roseburg, and Medford.

item.title: OR-38 East at OR-138
item.description: OR-38 east at OR-138. Turn right for OR-138 east to Roseburg and Sutherlin. Turn left for OR-38 east to Drain and Eugene.

item.title: OR-38 East Approaching OR-138
item.description: OR-38 East Approaching OR-138 in Elkton. Use OR-138 east for Sutherlin and Roseburg.

item.title: Harvard Ave. East at I-5 and OR-138
item.description: Harvard Ave. East at I-5 and OR-138. Turn right for I-5 south for Fairgrounds and Medford. Straight for I-5 North/OR-138 West to Portland; and straight for OR-138 East to City Center.

item.title: Harvard Ave. East Approaching I-5/OR-138
item.description: Harvard Ave. East approaching I-5/OR-138 in Roseburg.

item.title: OR-138 West at I-5 South
item.description: OR-138 West at I-5 South to Fairgrounds and Medford.

item.title: OR-138 West at I-5 Junction
item.description: OR-138 West at I-5 junction. OR-138 west joins I-5 northbound.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-138 West approaching I-5. Turn right for I-5 north to Portland; use left lane for I-5 south to Medford and Fairgrounds.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching I-5
item.description: OR-138 West approaching I-5 in Roseburg. Use right lane for I-5 North and OR-138 West. OR-138 west joins I-5 north to Sutherlin.

item.title: OR-138 West at OR-99 South
item.description: OR-138 West (Washington St.) at OR-99 South in Roseburg. Continue straight for OR-138 west to Freeway (I-5) and West Roseburg. Turn left for OR-99 south to City Center and Winston.

item.title: OR-99 North at OR-138
item.description: OR-99 North at OR-138 West (Washington Ave.). Continue straight for OR-99 North/OR-138 East to Diamond Lake and Winchester. Turn left for OR-138 west to Freeway (I-5) and West Roseburg.

item.title: OR-99 South/OR-138 West at OR-99/OR-138 Split
item.description: OR-99 South/OR-138 West at OR-99/OR-138 Split. Turn right for OR-138 West (Pine St.) to Freeway (I-5) and West Roseburg. Continue south on OR-99 (Stephen St.) for City Center and Winston.

item.title: OR-99 South/OR-138 West Approaching OR-99/OR-138 Split
item.description: OR-99 South/OR-138 West approaching OR-99/OR-138 split. Use left lanes to continue south on OR-99 (Stephens St.)

item.title: OR-138 West/OR-99 South - Use Right Lanes for I-5/OR-138
item.description: OR-138 West/OR-99 South (Stephens St.) in Roseburg. Use right lanes for I-5/OR-138 West.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching OR-99 In Roseburg
item.description: OR-138 West (Diamond Lake Blvd.) approaching OR-99 (Stephens St.) in Roseburg. Turn left to continue west on OR-138 and for access to I-5 and the Roseburg City Center. OR-138 joins OR-99 for a few blocks into Roseburg.

item.title: Incorrect OR-138 West Shield
item.description: Incorrect OR-138 shield displayed as a US highway marker. Taken between Lemolo Lake and Clearwater Falls.

item.title: Birds Point Road at OR-138
item.description: Birds Point Road at OR-138. Birds Point Road connects the Lemolo Lake area with OR-138. Use OR-138 west to Roseburg; east to Diamond Lake.

item.title: OR-138 West at OR-230
item.description: OR-138 West at OR-230 west to Diamond Lake South Shore and Medford. On the day this photograph was taken a forest fire had closed down OR-230 west, as well as the campgrounds at nearby Diamond Lake. Continue west on OR-138 for Diamond Lake North Shore and Roseburg.

item.title: OR-138 West Approaching OR-230
item.description: OR-138 West approaching OR-230 south to Medford.

item.title: OR-138 west at Crater Lake North Entrance
item.description: OR-138 west at Crater Lake north entrance. Continue right for OR-138 west to Diamond Lake, Medford, and Roseburg.

item.title: Distance Marker on OR-138 West
item.description: Distance marker on OR-138 west to Diamond Lake, Crater Lake, and Roseburg. Taken just west of Diamond Lake Junction.

item.title: Cascades Closure Information
item.description: Road closure information for OR-230, OR-138, and Crater Lake in the Oregon Cascades. Closures are listed in a simple route diagram.

item.title: US-97 South at OR-138
item.description: US-97 south at OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) west to Diamond Lake, Medford, and Roseburg.

item.title: US-97 South Approaching OR-138
item.description: US-97 south approaching OR-138 (North Umpqua Highway) to Diamond Lake, Roseburg, and Medford.

item.title: End OR-230 North at OR-138
item.description: Northern end of OR-230 at OR-138 to Roseburg and Bend.
